content: भ्रंशः --सः [भ्रंश्-भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Falling off, dropping down, fall, slipping or falling down; सेहेऽस्य न ध्रंशमतो न लोभात् <ls>R. 16. 74</ls>; कनकवलयभ्रंशरिक्तप्रकोष्ठः <ls>Me. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Decline, decrease, decay. {@--3@} Fall, destruction, ruin, overthrow. {@--4@} Running away. {@--5@} Disappearance. {@--6@} Losing, loss, deprivation; स्मृतिभ्रंशाद् बुद्धिनाशः <ls>Bg. 2. 63</ls>; so जातिभ्रश, स्वार्थभ्रश. {@--7@} Straying, swerving, or deviating from. {@--8@} Abandoning, deserting.
